definition: to pass on/to spread/to transmit/to infect/to transfer/to circulate/to conduct (electricity)

sentences.english: Please fax this form to Beijing IHAC project office.
sentences.chinese: 請將此表傳真至北京藝匯家項目辦。

sentences.english: Okay. Do you have our fax number?
sentences.chinese: 好的。你有沒有我們的傳真號碼呢？

sentences.english: To avoid duplication, please do not mail faxed order form.
sentences.chinese: 已傳真表格，毋須再郵寄，以免重複。

sentences.english: After finishing fax, please take back documents promptly and keep the desk clean.
sentences.chinese: 大家發完傳真後，請及時收回文件，並保持桌面整潔。

sentences.english: After you think it over- pleottom let me know by fax.
sentences.chinese: 你仔細商酌過之後，請用傳真相告。

sentences.english: Avon Lake, Ohio school Address Telephone Fax arrangement.
sentences.chinese: 埃文湖，俄亥俄學校排名電話傳真網址。

sentences.english: Does the supplier write its the precise address and fax number on the head of the letter ?
sentences.chinese: 供應商的信頭是否寫明瞭公司地址和傳真號碼？

sentences.english: The fax has switched to the transmit mode.
sentences.chinese: 傳真機已轉換到傳送模式。

sentences.english: A colleague in Ghana had telex but no fax.
sentences.chinese: 在加納共和國的同事有電傳機，但沒有傳真機。

sentences.english: Now speed up to 300 per minute to collect fax or telephone number.
sentences.chinese: 現在速度達到每分鐘收集300個傳真或電話號碼。

sentences.english: I'msorry, the fax number is wrong, would you please check it?
sentences.chinese: 對不起，傳真號碼不對，請您檢查一下好嗎？

sentences.english: We have advised you this morning by fax of our appreciation that this matter has now been settled.
sentences.chinese: 今天上午，我方已發傳真感謝貴方索賠問題已獲解決。

sentences.english: Receive fax-in and sort by dept. Distribute fax once a day.
sentences.chinese: 收傳真並分類，每天一次按部門分發傳真。

sentences.english: Receive fax-in and sort by dept. Distribute fax once a day.
sentences.chinese: 收傳真並分類，每天一次按部門分發傳真。

sentences.english: What abut operating the fax and duplicators？
sentences.chinese: 你會發傳真和使用複印機嗎？

definition: email/abbr. for 電子郵件|电子邮件[dian4 zi3 you2 jian4]
to check/to inquire/to consult (a document etc)/inquiry/query
to transfer (money to a bank account)
to present/to give/to hand over/to hand in/to lay before
special-purpose phone line or communications link/hotline/special rail line (e.g. between airport and city)/CL:條|条[tiao2]
